body: insanity is doing the exact same fucking thing over and over and over and over again. expecting shit to change. that is crazy.

I confess i always played Chun-li in Street Fighter 2 Turbo™ for perverted reasons. As a male feminist I am ashamed of myself for exploiting a woman for my sexual needs. I would always lose Balrog on purpose because even at the ripe age of 11, I knew that African-Americans were superior to me. One day I hope that one will honor me by sleeping with the woman that I love. I will be at her side holding her hand as she is slightly afraid of the large penis that is about to enter her. A penis that is more than twice the size of my own. I will watch as my dream bull enters her and she lets go of my hand to grasp her new lover. I ill cry tears of joy as I know that I for filled my life's mission. Then I can forgive myself as a male feminist and LGBT ally and continue to donation to charities that help intercity kids. So, wish me luck my fellow NTR-lovers.
